# splitViewItems

**Instance Property**

The array of split view items that correspond to the split view controller’s child view controllers.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var splitViewItems: [NSSplitViewItem] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting this property implicitly calls the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController/insertSplitViewItem(_:at:)] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController/removeSplitViewItem(_:)] method, as appropriate, to add or remove split view items from this array.

If you add a child view controller to the split view controller, the system automatically creates a default split view item for the child view controller and adds it to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController/splitViewItems] array.

If you remove a child view controller, the split view controller removes its corresponding split view item from the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController/splitViewItems] array.

## Configuring and Managing a Split View Controller

- **splitView**: The split view that the split view controller manages.
- **splitViewItem(for:)**: Returns the corresponding split view item for the specified child view controller of the split view controller.
- **NSSplitViewItem**: An item in a split view controller.
